import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; function About() { const { content } = useLanguage(); const { about } = content; return (

{about.eyebrow}

{about.title}

{about.description}

{about.introTitle}

{about.introParagraphs.map((paragraph) => (

{paragraph}

))}

{about.strengthsTitle}

    {about.strengths.map((item) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}

{about.workflowTitle}

    {about.workflow.map((item) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
); } export default About;
